title: hextech crafting
body:
why is it every time i get 3 keys and 1 chest i open it and i always get the same things 3 times in a row.
i got imperial lux 3 times and scorched xerath 3 times in a row

replies.body: Hey this definitely isn't intended, could you give us more info? Were you getting three shards the same from one chest? or from three chests in a row? Any info you can give us would be great. Screenshots would also be VERY welcome.
i got imperial lux  from a chest so i brought him and opened another chest and got imperial lux again then again then got scorched xerath then again and again
So one of the player support peeps looked into it, and it seems you just encountered the very low chance of this happening. So uhhh congrats on the luck I guess? :3
